articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: China’s Xi and India’s Modi meet after border accord between two countries - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Narendra Modi and Xi Jinping hold talks on the sidelines of the BRICS summit in the Russian city of Kazan.
articles.content:
Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Chinese President Xi Jinping have held their first formal talks in five years, a sign that icy relations are thawing after a deadly military clash in 2020.
